https://schema.org/abstract.@value: The Istituto Comprensivo I.C. n.7 - Via Scandellara Bologna and the Polifonia team were invited to take part in a workshop aimed at engaging more girls and women in STEM careers. The event was held on April 29th at Istituto Comprensivo I.C. n.7 - Via Scandellara Bologna.
